sources.title: The Cheaters
sources.description: Title: The Cheaters Summary: An eccentric wealthy family facing bankruptcy schemes to steal an inheritance, but an alcoholic ex-actor they take in for Christmas charity complicates their plan. Directed by: Joseph Kane Actors: Joseph Schildkraut, Billie Burke, Eugene Pallette Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 15 July 1945 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A wealthy family is preparing for Christmas in their usual stylish fashion. They hit on a bright idea that will make them outstanding during this holiday season among their friends. They will adopt a "lost man" and bring him to their house for the holidays. They find a news story of a washed-up actor who has attempted to commit suicide and bring him to their home. The actor proves far more than they bargained for and he shows them some real truths about giving and living.
